# DateIntervalFormatter.Style

**Enumeration**

Formatting styles for individual date and time values.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Constants

- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.none**: No information for the date or time. Use this style when you do not want to include date or time information in the resulting string.
- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.short**: An abbreviated date or time format.
- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.medium**: A medium length date or time format.
- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.long**: A long length date or time format.
- **DateIntervalFormatter.Style.full**: A fully spelled out date or time format.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
